comments.text:
+Terrance W blah blah blah, keep drinking the Kool aid and do the happy 
kool aid dance. He didn't make gas cheap again, thats fukn retarded. He 
doesn't own an oil company, he aint OPEC. Gas is cheaper because the market 
drove it there and fracking is cheaper than drilling. Free healthcare? We 
already had free healthcare dummy if you are poor. He penalizes people who 
do not insure themselves. "Obamacare" is cheap in some cases but if you 
can't even afford Obamacare you're screwed, and thanks to the fact that 
illegal aliens have all the jobs due to his open borders policy, a lot of 
people still have no coverage. Raised wages? WTF are you talking about, 
people making less than ever in specialized jobs. I know college graduates 
working at Trader Joes and Ralphs because they can't find a job in their 
specialized field.
All our tech jobs got exported and our manufacturing base is pathetic. 
Detroit lays in ruins while chinese developers buy up all our real estate. 
Things aren't better man they just threw a coat of paint on a termite 
ridden house that's crumbling. Now take your ratchet ass back to wherever 
you came from and go wrap some presents or something cuz Christmas is 
tomorrow son.

comments.author: HalfStepTheory

comments.text:
+wingchisao You just proved that you are nothing but an empty hollow drum 
with a filthy mouth. You cannot defend your point of view with logic and 
fact and therefore, you resort to insult. What you wrote above does not 
define me, it define you. A person with no class and no dignity. You cannot 
argue with facts. THERE ARE ONLY 5 COUNTRIES LEFT WHO FOLLOW COMMUNISM 
PRINCIPLES. THAT IS NOT PLENTY. You are a waste of my time! Stay ignorant!
comments.author: Moji Adibpour

comments.text:
I stand by the statement, but we were not debating politics. There are 
plenty of countries you can move to if you want communist policies. And I 
didn't say anything I heard on any radio or TV program. I learned what 
socialism and communism are, and what it does to people in school. I see 
the effects of it by paying attention to those who have escaped it and told 
the truth about it. And lastly, you are absolutely correct about low info 
voters. You are one. You're an asshole that likes to get behind a keyboard 
and pretend to know wtf you're talking about. I don't blame the 
[politicians for anything other than what they do, but I blame YOU and the 
idiots that voted them into office in the first place.
Speaking of swallowing bullshit, how's that president of yours doing?
Moron.
comments.author: HalfStepTheory

comments.text:
+wingchisao You are kidding, right? Go back and read your previous reply to 
me where you tell me if I want universal health care for the US citizens " 
If you want that, there are plenty of communist countries you can move to 
that offer it)" This is direct quote from your own reply. If this is not 
political discussion I am not sure what is?
But, no need to reply to my post. I know what is happening and so do you. 
You said something you have heard on Rush's radio show,Glenn Beck's podcast 
or Fox news and you just repeated it without thinking or researching it. 
Such is the state of politics among masses in the United of States. People 
blame politicians for their problems whereas they should blame themselves 
for being such a low information voters. Politicians (of all stripes) do 
what is to their benefits and their friend's benefits. It is up to the rest 
of us not to swallow the bull shit!
comments.author: OwlsEyelash

comments.text:
+OwlsEyelash You and I were not in a debate about politics. I called you a 
jerk because you were being a jerk.
comments.author: HalfStepTheory

comments.text:
+wingchisao Your reply reminded again why I should not get into a debate 
with an individual who does not know much about politics, does not read 
much, is not intellectually curious. As soon as some one says something you 
narrow-minded people do not agree with, you start with tired and tiresome 
analogy of "Communism" etc. etc. Not that it makes any  difference since I 
am sure you will never concede that you have learned something new but I 
could not end my comment without informing you that there are ONLY five 
countries that are officially called a Communist country: China, Cuba, 
Laos, North Korea and Vietnam and I am not even sure about a couple of 
them. There are 196 countries in the world, Five countries out of 96 is 
about 2.5% which is hardly "Plenty of Communist countries". If math is not 
your strong skill, let me explain to in a way so you can understand. 3.5% 
of Federal tax goes toward education and of that 1 penny goes to sciences. 
No wonder you think 5 countries is plenty or maybe you did not even know 
that there are only 5 countries that are Communists. Canada, Sweden, 
France, UK, and Italy are among countries which offer universal health care 
to their citizens. They are also all "Free market", "Capitalists" and 
"Democratic" Western countries, allies of the United States and most of 
them are NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) members (except Sweden) 
and if you do not know what NATO is Google it. No Communist country is a 
member of NATO!
All these above mentioned countries spend less on health care than the U.S. 
and deliver health care to EVERY CITIZEN!
One last thing, Google the term "Godwin's Rule of Nazi Analogies" which 
states that in any discussion of controversial subject, sooner or later 
somebody will make the comparison to Hitler and Nazism. Now, I would like 
to coin the term of "OwlsEyelash Rule of Communism Analogies". Sooner or 
later, some uninformed individual compares Universal Healthcare to 
Communism! FALLACY! That is what it is. Read a bit, you will be a much 
better debater. Good day!
comments.author: OwlsEyelash

comments.text:
+OwlsEyelash You are correct. There are a lot of things to criticize Obama 
for, like Benghazi, NSA overreach, refusing to enforce existing immigration 
law, and lying to the American people over and over again about the 
disaster of a health care law (which should NOT be a communist single-payer 
system. If you want that, there are plenty of communist countries you can 
move to that offer it). And clearly I did not need to state a reason for 
calling you a jerk, since you so easily could see why I called you that. 
How's that for not putting up with someone's bullshit?
comments.author: HalfStepTheory

comments.text:
+wingchisao Why? Because I do not put up with bull shit people throw? There 
are a lot of things to criticize President Obama about, Guantanamo Bay, 
handling of ACA (should have been single-payer) etc. but to write a stupid 
comment like sarah47201c has written is childish at best and moronic and 
mean spirited at worst. And, a jerk is someone who calls others names, like 
you do without giving a reason.
comments.author: OwlsEyelash

comments.text: +OwlsEyelash You're kind of a jerk.
